rows.label: tlk41200121_02_msg0001
rows.name:
Oh, perfect timing.
There's something I've been wanting
to ask Drivers and Blades like you.

rows.label: tlk41200121_02_msg0002
rows.name:
You have to fight against
monsters a lot, right?

rows.label: tlk41200121_02_msg0003
rows.name:
Have you ever seen any monsters get
really angry after taking damage?

rows.label: tlk41200121_02_msg0006
rows.name: There aren't any monsters like that

rows.label: tlk41200121_02_msg0008
rows.name:
After all, monsters are living
creatures too. They must get
angry from time to time.

rows.label: tlk41200121_02_msg0010
rows.name:
Are there any monsters out there
that actually block your attacks?

rows.label: tlk41200121_02_msg0011
rows.name: Wow, they do that too, huh?

rows.label: tlk41200121_02_msg0012
rows.name:
I guess monsters like that would be
tough to defeat, since you need to stop
them from guarding to deal damage.

rows.label: tlk41200121_02_msg0013
rows.name:
OK, thanks for all your help.
I'm going to brag to my dad that I know
all this stuff about monsters now!

rows.label: tlk41200121_02_msg0015
rows.name:
Maybe they're out there somewhere
and you just haven't met them yet...
